name: meteors (itch) (nDever)
description:
As a lost space traveler, can you pilot your VOYAGER class starship to the end of the meteoroid field?

meteors is a re-imagining of the 1979 Atari classic Asteroids designed by Ed Logg and Lyle Rains.

Controls

up: forward
left right: turn
down: hyperwarp (warp to a random position)

A: fire star torpedo
space: pause/unpause
escape: quit

Programming, visuals, and sounds by Jared Thomas
